rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Welcoming open space with traditional Kerala motifs and Vastu compliant orientation. Wide doorways for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Lobby
rooms.description: Transition area connecting the entrance to the main living spaces, featuring accessible pathways and ample lighting.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage with automatic doors and a ramp for wheelchair accessibility. Storage space integrated below.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with traditional wood carvings and open windows ensuring natural ventilation in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala kitchen integrated with modern appliances. Features low counters and an accessible layout for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, offering a comfortable dining space that adheres to both traditional aesthetics and modern functionality.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with ergonomic design, accessible desk height for wheelchair users, and ample storage.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Accessible guest bedroom featuring traditional Kerala design elements, ensuring easy navigation for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom with en-suite bathroom and accessible design features including wider doorways and barrier-free access to the balcony area.

openings.description: Accessible, with easy-open handles for wheelchair users.
Large windows for ample natural light, designed to align with Vastu principles.
Accessible passage ensuring connectivity between spaces.
Automatic sliding door with accessibility ramp integrated for smooth entry/exit.

special_features: Home theater integrated within the living area or an additional dedicated room (not explicitly listed in ground floor due to space constraints).
additional_information.notes: The home theater has been planned on the first floor, ensuring separation from other spaces while maintaining traditional aesthetics and meeting acoustic requirements.
